entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4 except 7 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4 except 7 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016
